text: Allah kebala tadera sanbandhe tomadera nisedha karachena yara dharmera karane tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha kareche o tomadera barighara theke tomadera tariye diyeche ebam prsthaposakata kareche tomadera bahiskarera byapare, -- ye tomara tadera sange bandhutba patabe. Ara ye ke'u tadera sange bandhutba patabe tara'i to tabe sbayam an'yayakari.
